title: Borders, 1950-59-3, 1820
inscribed: Excise stamp on back shows crown with legend: "First Account Taken - 220."
provenance: Unused length from the Royal Pavilion.
creditline: Gift of Brighton Art Gallery and Museum
description: Parallel strips of brown bamboo, with highlights, on yellow ground. Eight colors. Two borders included in one width. Shadows falling on ground change direction at approximately mid point of each single width of border.
